title: MOVMSKPS â€” Extract Packed Single-Precision Floating-Point Sign Mask

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`MOVMSKPS reg, xmm`
`VMOVMSKPS reg, xmm2`
`VMOVMSKPS reg, ymm2`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Extracts the sign bits from the packed single-precision floating-point values in the source operand (second operand), formats them into a 4- or 8-bit mask, and stores the mask in the destination operand (first operand). The source operand is an XMM or YMM register, and the destination operand is a general-purpose register. The mask is stored in the 4 or 8 low-order bits of the destination operand. The upper bits of the destination operand beyond the mask are filled with zeros.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: In 64-bit mode, the instruction can access additional registers (XMM8-XMM15, R8-R15) when used with a REX.R prefix. The default operand size is 64-bit in 64-bit mode.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: 128-bit versions: The source operand is a YMM register. The destination operand is a general purpose register.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: VEX.256 encoded version: The source operand is a YMM register. The destination operand is a general purpose register.

fields.name: ​
fields.value: Note: In VEX-encoded versions, VEX.vvvv is reserved and must be 1111b, otherwise instructions will #UD.
